Private Desk

A 2-minute walk from the Place du Vieux Marché, and a few steps from the Seine, Le Studio Vieux Marché is our very first workspace, opened in 2016!

Level 7/180 Flinders St, Melbourne VIC 3000, Australia

Information

Discover our range of fully furnished office spaces designed to meet your needs. From meeting rooms available by the hour or day to business lounges and collaboration areas, we offer everything you need for a productive workday. Enjoy the convenience of manned receptions with 24/7 access and work in privacy whenever you need.

  1. Range of fully furnished office spaces
  2. Meeting rooms available by the hour or day
  3. Business lounges and collaboration areas
  4. Manned receptions with 24/7 access
  5. Privacy-focused workspaces
  6. 24 x 7 access

Discover a dynamic coworking space where innovation and collaboration come to life. Our environment is designed to facilitate seamless interactions and provide top-notch resources for your business needs. Benefit from flexible office solutions, high-speed internet, and state-of-the-art technology. Our dedicated team ensures that every aspect of your workspace is tailored to support your success, from ergonomic furniture to well-appointed meeting rooms. Engage with a vibrant community of professionals and entrepreneurs who share your passion for growth and creativity. Whether you need a private office, a hot desk, or a meeting room, our space adapts to fit your requirements and helps you achieve your business goals efficiently and effectively.

“Why Work Alone When You Can Work Together? Whatever You Do, Do It Here.”

Experience a collaborative environment designed to enhance your productivity and foster creativity. Join a community where you can grow your business, connect with others, and achieve your goals in a supportive and well-equipped space.

Fiber Optic WiFi

Stay connected with our high-speed fiber optic WiFi available throughout the space, ensuring seamless online experiences.

Cafeteria

Enjoy a variety of delicious meals and snacks in our well-equipped cafeteria area, perfect for taking breaks and recharging.

Flexible Desks

Choose any desk that suits your work style, with options available to accommodate your needs, making it easy to stay productive.

Lockers

Secure your personal items in our conveniently located lockers, providing peace of mind and easy access whenever you need.

100% Secure

Feel safe and secure with our advanced security systems and measures, designed to protect you and your belongings at all times.

Printers & Fax

Access printers and fax machines for all your document needs, ensuring you can handle any printing or communication tasks with ease.

Common Area

Relax, socialize, or network in our comfortable and spacious common areas, designed to foster a sense of community and collaboration.

24x7 Access

Work on your schedule with around-the-clock access to the space, giving you the flexibility to work whenever it suits you best.

Other Activities

Participate in a variety of activities and events organized for our members, offering opportunities for learning, networking, and fun.

Experience a space designed for innovation and collaboration, where you can access cutting-edge technology and tailored services. Our coworking environment is built to support your professional growth, with flexible office solutions and a vibrant community of like-minded individuals. Whether you're looking to focus on a project or network with other professionals, our space provides the perfect setting to achieve your goals. We prioritize seamless customer service and ensure that our facilities meet the highest standards for comfort and efficiency.
